DOC.brief_summary: It is a observational prospective study. The aim of this study is to compare neostigmine vs sugammadex in the resolution of neuro-muscular blockade in great obese patients.
DOC.brief_title: Resolution of Neuro-muscular Block in Great Obese Patients: Neostigmine vs Sugammadex
DOC.criteria: Great obese Videolaparoscopic surgery Age under 18 No acceptation of informed consent New York Heart Association > 2
